message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI 

The paper deals with object tracking in video sequences, which is a common problem in computer vision and falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The method proposed in the paper leverages human knowledge in the form of annotated video libraries, which involves large-scale search and retrieval of videos, making it relevant to machine learning (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. The proposed method also involves adapting retrieved object locations to the new video using an efficient warping scheme, which can be seen as a form of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
